author: Jamie MacFarlane
comment: Nice app but I am finding that a lot of road names are missing. Even when zoomed in. Some names are there and some just aren't. I have another mini map app on my watch and the roads show up fine. But I must say would like to use your one as the app is more polished.
title: Road names missing?

author: King Mohican
comment: Very good concept but it's not working on Sony SWR 50. It has no respond when you tap on the watch, hope the developer can address this. Support your work!!
title: Sony Smart watch SWR50 not working

author: Noam Rathaus
comment: Does exactly what you want, its a bit confusing that if you click on the app nothing happens, maybe some information would be better than nothing :) updated: after a few days of usage can't say this is useful, resolution is too low to read what it says, can't do much after it displays the screenshot of the map, beside opening Google map, so just as well open Google map
title: Very nice notification app

author: Kevin Chiu
comment: Well implemented, but could display better on the moto 360 (notification check box page is a bit cut off on the round display). Would be even more useful if it had an option to text the location to a friend.
title: Works as Advertised

author: Andrew Jackson
comment: Adding the option to disable notifications is a much needed feature but can this be put after the "Open Map" option since that's needed more often. Also some sort of progress that the search for your location is happening would be good.
title: Great idea

author: gerald fraser
comment: Really impressed how well this app worked in the tiny village where I live by the Oslofjord, but it was of little use after that
title: Changed my mind

author: Sean K
comment: Does not display correct location and map does not show up for android wear 5.0.1 please fix
title: Latest wear update broke it

author: Guy Fenby
comment: Great app. One improvement would be an option to text the address to someone. U could have used this option a few time already

author: pete the
comment: No accessible app on phone and my Moto 360 is not showing any notifications at all from any app. Also, it's been more than >30 mins and I can't see this app on my watch anywhere. Deleting this. :/
title: Blocked all notifications and doesn't appear on watch

comment: Very useful!! How many times I have been in a city and lost! This shows you in seconds were you are without using your phone!! Now it needs some more options!!
title: Very good!!!

author: Phil Thomas
comment: This app is wrong more often then right, sometimes comically so.
title: Oddness

author: Hai Mac
comment: Developer responded quickly, added settings and reduced triggering. Much better now!

reply.author: DepollSoft
reply.content: The latest update (1.1) will hopefully address this issue for you.

title: Good app!

author: Greg McKellar
comment: Ok now it works but it is not explained well regards the swipe up to see it.
title: Does what you want it to do

author: Tanveer Aslam
comment: Great little app that shows your current location on your wrist. Made me love my watch even more :)
title: Very useful

author: Anton Chuvakin
comment: After the install. Never showed the address since that first time.
title: Works a grand total of 1 times

author: Brandon Moon
comment: How do you say @here? Google will not accept that. Fail
title: Almost

author: jalen martin
comment: Love this app. Always have a general idea as to where I am when I go places for the first time. Or even when I go to NYC and walk around.

author: Tom Donhavjuan
comment: And a Share option for the location! :D
title: Satellite view option would make it 5 stars.

author: Allyn Thomas
comment: In a month this app has used 44mb! Does give a good overview of where you are and is displayed conveniently but at such a high cost to data.
title: Useful, but eats data

author: Al Darn
comment: A nice idea that's undependable. I want to like it but uninstalled it.
title: Undependable

comment: The app takes a while to load.
title: Notification are slow

author: Jaxon Brooks
comment: Feature request: Click to send location via SMS.
title: Simple, elegant, easy to use.

author: David Dosch
comment: Didn't work with my LG Gear R

author: Joseph Stanley
comment: Each time I use this app it suggests a web page ace provides a link on my phone. I'm on a moto360/N5 with the latest stock updates.
title: Suggests a web page every time.

author: Marvel King
comment: A real legitimate app. Works great as advertised. Hope to see future updates.
title: Great!

author: Jerry Chew
comment: Please help to resolve as soon as possible
title: Can't show on sony smartwatch 3

author: John Slater
comment: Looks good, works well, tiny footprint. Good stuff.
title: This app is great.

author: Reza Arani
comment: Does not work on huawei watch

author: Pouria F.
comment: Doesn't work on my moto 360
title: Doesn't work

author: John L. Stanley
comment: App appeared on watch, but when I try to open it, nothing happens...  Uninstalling ...
title: No show on Sony Smartwatch 3

author: jkmerlin
comment: Finds my location the same that my phone does with some extra info, all on my watch
title: Does what it needs to

author: Super G
comment: LG G watch works but only after 10 to 15 minutes. Is it normal?

author: tariq dari
comment: Any way I can check "history" of my locations??
title: I like it

author: John Parker
comment: Very useful android wear application . Great if you are on the train and want to see where you are.
title: Great Public Transport Companion

author: Jesus R. Casales
comment: One suggestion though, leave "automatic notification" screen for last. Put "Open on maps" before it. Great job.
title: Great app

author: Brian Polito
comment: It's the second biggest data eater on my phone. Had to uninstall
title: Really like it but

author: David Vera
comment: Moto 360
title: Dont work

author: Daniel Carston
comment: Like the app, but should be a text option to text to others
title: Texting

author: Joel Groves
comment: Seriously high data usage, avoid.
title: How much data!

author: Nikola Mandic
comment: Not working ob LG G Watch
